OutputParagraphs: Vyacheslav Shengur's solution. Hope, you'll like it.
Start entering the contents of the cart, where each line is a separate item in the order.
Template for the line - {quantity of products} {product name} at {cost of one unit of goods or services in format X.XX}.
After filling all the items in the basket, to finish, press Enter twice to add an empty line.
Then, a check will be displayed with the calculation of all necessary taxes and the total amount.
